title: Dr.Meet - Doctor Appointment App
description: A full-stack MERN app where patients can book appointments, doctors manage appointments, and admins control everything. Includes authentication, role-based dashboard, and Firebase.
challenge: Implementing role-based access (admin, doctor, patient) with protected routes and JWT token verification using cookies was tricky. Also, syncing appointment status and real-time dashboard updates took extra logic.
futurePlan: Integrate secure video calling functionality for virtual appointments
Implement real-time chat between patients and doctors
Generate patient health reports using AI diagnostics

name: Fitness Zone
description: Fitness Zone is a full-stack fitness tracking and management platform designed to help users maintain a healthy lifestyle. This application allows users to track workouts, set fitness goals, monitor progress, and get personalized recommendations. It features a user-friendly dashboard with real-time updates to enhance the fitness experience.
challenge: Interactive and responsive UI with React.js
Backend with Node.js and Express.js for API handling

name: Glob_visita Agency
description: The Travel Agency project is a modern, responsive web platform designed to help users plan and book their trips effortlessly. It allows travelers to explore destinations, view tour packages, and make online bookings with ease. The platform features user-friendly navigation, search and filter options, and detailed information on tours and services. Built with Next.js, the project ensures a seamless and interactive experience for users while providing efficient management tools for the agency.
challenge: Building a dynamic and responsive UI with Next.js
Implementing smooth navigation and interactive components
Showcasing travel destinations and tour packages effectively
Optimizing performance and responsiveness for desktop and mobile
futurePlan: Add user authentication for login and account creation
Integrate a database for storing user preferences and bookings
Implement real-time communication with Socket.io for travel agency members
Enable users to save and manage multiple travel plans securely

name: Book Library
description: Book Library is a full-stack web application designed to help users explore, manage, and track their reading journey. The platform allows users to browse books, add new books to the collection, and maintain a personalized reading list. With Firebase authentication, users can securely log in and save their preferences.
challenge: Interactive and responsive UI with React.js
Backend API powered by Node.js and Express.js
MongoDB integration for storing book and user data
futurePlan: Integration with e-book and audiobook platforms
